supportingMedia.value:
To be exposed to this issue node-slicing must be configured:

[ chassis network-slices guest-network-functions ]

configuration.value:
To be exposed to this issue node-slicing must be configured:

  [ chassis network-slices guest-network-functions ]

supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

description.value: CWE-668 Exposure of Resource to Wrong Sphere

supportingMedia.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS 20.4R3-S9, 21.2R3-S3, 21.4R3-S5, 22.1R3, 22.2R3, 22.3R2, 22.4R1, and all subsequent releases.

solution.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS 20.4R3-S9, 21.2R3-S3, 21.4R3-S5, 22.1R3, 22.2R3, 22.3R2, 22.4R1, and all subsequent releases.

supportingMedia.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.

work_around.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.
